"Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."
"Welcome! This appears to be your first time logging in. Please enter your full name and we'll get you started."
Password should be at least 6 characters long

Your account has successfully been created! Check your email for a verification link. Once you\'ve verified your account, you will be able to log in.
Your account has not yet been verified. Please check your email for a verification link.
The password reset email was successfully sent! Please check your email.
The password reset email could not be sent. Please ensure you are connected to the internet, or try again later.
Please enter your email address so we can send you a password reset email.
"Describe what you are studying and help people find you in this box"
You have been kicked from the study group.
Are you sure you want to transfer leadership to %1$s?
You are now the leader of this study group!
Please leave or disband your group before signing out.

Study Bananas is an open source application, created with the intention of bringing people together to study. It is a 10-week project designed and implemented by a team of 10 students for the CSE 110 class at UCSD. We hope that it proves useful in finding people to study with.

The Team
David Chang - Algorithm Specialist
 Christopher Harris - Software Dev. Lead
 John Murcko - Sr. System Analyst
 Tarun Pasumarthi - 2nd Software Dev. Lead
 Harley Saxton - UI Specialist
 Ryan Shim - QA Lead
 Gokul Suresh - Database Specialist
 Andrew Yoo - Business Analyst
 William Yu - Software Architect
 Julia Li - Project Manager
